scripts.dev: rimraf build && concurrently --names "STYLES,SCRIPTS,PAGES,COPY" -c "blue.bold,magenta.bold,green.bold,yellow.bold" "yarn run dev:styles" "yarn run dev:scripts" "yarn run dev:pages" "yarn run dev:copy"
scripts.prod: rimraf build && yarn run setup-deps && concurrently --names "STYLES,SCRIPTS,PAGES,COPY" -c "blue.bold,magenta.bold,green.bold,yellow.bold" "yarn run prod:styles" "yarn run prod:scripts" "yarn run prod:pages" "yarn run prod:copy"
scripts.publish: yarn run prod && yarn version --patch && git push --tags && git push && echo "Successfully published a new version of the website"
